info.description:
# **总览** *此页描述渠道可以透过发送请求给eBET以获得相关资讯。* 管理玩家资金的方式：单钱包和转账钱包。 "转账钱包" : 玩家的资金由eBET管理 "单钱包" : 玩家的资金由渠道管理 根据管理方法发送不同的API请求。 # 充值 **仅适用于转账钱包** **eBET建议的处理流程** 1.先使用API：userinfo查询用户在eBET游戏中的当前金额。 发送充值API：发送rechargI来转用户的进/出金额。 3.成功收到响应，请使用API​​：rechargestatus 查询充值记录是否成功。 4. 如果一段时间内未收到对充值请求的响应，则可以调用API：rechargestatus （建议至少3次）以查询充值记录是否成功。 5.如充值成功可以将其写入数据库。如果不成功，请不要写入数据库并记录充值失败/成功日志。 # **关于OAuth登录** *提供渠道使用自己的登录页面来验证用户登录* **事先设定** ＊ 实作API：回调地址和OAuth JS窗口框架 ＊ 將其链接提供給eBET **流程说明** 1. 用户登录eBET平台，单击"登录"按钮，跳至所提供的验证登录链接。 2.成功验证后，向eBET发送API：回调成功请求。 3. 收到响应后，使用OAuth JS框架关闭页面。 # **eBET响应状态码**
Status Code Description
 -1  充值纪录不存在
 0  充值中
 200  成功
 201  重复的充值请求ID
 202  渠道不存在
 203  充值 ID 不能为空
 204  充值金额不能为 0
 205  充值金额太小
 207  退款金额不一致
 208  记录不存在
 209  已经退款的数据
 401  用户名或密码不正确
 410  无效的Token
 500  系统错误
 505  渠道服务器在维护中
 4003  系统繁忙，请稍后再试
 4025  参数不对
 4026  签名不对
 4027  IP 不允许
 4028  试玩玩家不能充值
 4029  功能无效
 4030  资料类型错误
 4037  用户不存在
 4038  频繁请求
 4202  接口调用次数不足
 5001  充值失败
 5002  余额不足，取款失败
 5003  子渠道不存在
 5005  钱包尚未开启
 5006  游戏中无法提领

tags.name: API used by transfer wallet
tags.description: eBET provides several APIs for transfer wallet.

tags.name: API used by single wallet
tags.description: eBET provides an API for single wallet.

tags.name: Common API
tags.description: APIs that any wallet can use.

post.description:
This API notifies eBET to process when the user's wallet amount is changed.
 Note: It returns success to indicate that a notification has been received, but processing is not complete.
 Note: There is no upper limit.
This API is to check whether eBET has received and processed the recharge request.

This api is to query the current amount of money for users who have logged in within a period of time.
 Note: Because the amount of data may be too large, it is recommended to bring the following parameters when requesting to reduce the query time.
 (startTimeStr, endTimeStr, pageNum, pageSize)
This api is query failed seqNo in eBET database.

This API is for querying bets recorded in a specific time period.
 Note: Because the amount of data may be too large, it is recommended to bring the following parameters when requesting to reduce the query time.
 (startTimeStr, endTimeStr, pageNum, pageSize)
The 30 game records that have ended so far and converted into luzhu information

luzhuList.description: Flop of each round. This parameter will only appear when count> 0.

luzhuStat.description: Status of each round. This parameter will only appear when count> 0.

post.description: Update user bet limit in each game

updateGameList.description:
Game code to update betting limit:
 1:Baccarat - VIP table
 2:Baccarat - Normal table
 3:Dragon Tiger
 4:Sic Bo
 5:Roulette
 6:Bull Bull (niuniu)
 23:Fortune Wheel

post.description:
Provides the URL of the user's betting history.
 The link screen displays the game name, bet date, bet amount, payout amount, round number, member bet type (text + icon), and the result card type (text + icon). As with eBET background betting details.

 URL path rules:
 1.Page link
 2.username
 3.channelId
 4.roundCode
 5.lang
 6.Add display = 1 to turn off the valid betting field; don't bring in or add display = 0 to show the valid betting field
 7.signature (need to be added by the channel using the GET method)
 The resulting rule is RSA (channelId+username+roundCode+lang)

path.description: link. Added username, channelId, roundCode and lang.

post.description:
This api is to query the current amount of money for users who have logged in within a period of time.
 Note: Because the amount of data may be too large, it is recommended to bring the following parameters when requesting to reduce the query time.
 (startTimeStr, endTimeStr, pageNum, pageSize)

bonusId.description: Event ID. Appears only when tradeType = 23,24

bonusName.description: Event name. Appears only when tradeType = 23,24

post.description:
This api is the total report in the query time period.
 Note: Only the records of successful bets and successful payouts are counted.
 The preset time period is the current day.

startTime.description: The beginning of the search period. Uses milliseconds. The format is Unix Time

endTime.description: The end of the search period. Used in milliseconds. The format is Unix Time

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
This API is to query the number of bets, the amount of bets, the effective bets and the surplus of each player in each game.
 The search period cannot exceed seven days.

post.description:
Take the player away from the eBET game.
 Note: The related functions must be enabled in the eBET background to use.

Get a link to log in to the slot game directly.
 Note: using this method will still send a verification login request. A login link will only be provided after successful verification.
Get a list of slot games.

Channels can use their own login portal if the channel does not want to go through eBET's login portal.
 The channel must request this API to notify eBET to let the player log in to the game after verifying the player.
 Note: Need to provide link and eBET should be set to open on the backend.

timestamp.description: Current time. In seconds. Format is Unix Time.

pageSize.description: The number of records displayed on each page. Default is 10. The maximum is 5000.

signature.description:
Signature. String splicing :username+timestamp
 Note: timestamp can be used alone if no username

remainingVisit.description: Number of remaining requests, 500 times per minute.

gameName.description:
Game name.
 1: Baccarat
 2: Dragon Tiger
 3: Sic Bo
 4: Roulette
 6: Slot
 7: Blockchain Baccarat
 8: Niu Niu(BullBull)
 23:  FortuneWheel

judgeResult.description:
Winning awards.
 niuniu: The result of the flop.

number.description: Only roulette. Number for the result.

allDices.description: Only sic-bo. Points for the result.

niuniuWithHoldingTotal.description: Only niuniu. Niuniu's total withholding amount.

payoutWithoutholding.description:
Exclude withholding total payout amount.
 If there is no withholding amount, the parameter value will be the same as payout.
 If there is a withholding amount, the calculation formula is payout-niuniuWithholdingtotal. If the parameter value is greater than 0, the player wins, and if it is 0, the player loses money.

createTime.description: Bet time. In seconds. Format is Unix Time.

payoutTime.description: Payout time. In seconds. Format is Unix Time.

money.description:
To change the amount.
 Positive numbers represent transfer in. 
 Negative numbers represent transfer out.

minMoney.description: Minimum amount of money. Below this amount will not be displayed.

withNo200.description: Get success record. Default is false.

betStatus.description:
Check the betting status. Default is all records
 0: query only failed records
 1: query only successful records

gameType.description:
Game type.
 1: Baccarat
 2: Dragon Tiger
 3: Sic Bo
 4: Roulette
 6: Slot
 7: Blockchain Baccarat
 8: Niu Niu(BullBull)
 23:  FortuneWheel

judgeTime.description:
Judgment query time. Default is 0
 0: Payout time
 1: Bet time

isSeparate.description:
The way betHistories is displayed. Default is false.
 true: segment by the number of confirmed bets
 false: according to payout records do show
 Note: This parameter will not affect the calculation of other parameters. It will still be processed based on the number of payouts.

betType.description:
Game type.
 1:Baccarat - VIP table
 2:Baccarat - Normal table
 3:Dragon Tiger
 4:Sic Bo
 5:Roulette
 6:Bull Bull (niuniu)
 23:Fortune Wheel

betHistoryId.description:
Bet Record ID.
 Must take username and roundCode if not take this parameter.

judgeTime.description:
Judgment query time. Default is 1
 0: Payout time
 1: Bet time

Judgment query time. Default is 1
 0: Payout time
 1: Bet time

loginEventType.description:
Login method:
 1: Normal login
 4: Token login

pwd.description: Password for login. Required when loginEventType = 1

token.description: AccessToken for login. Required when loginEventType = 4

timestamp.description: Current time. In seconds. Format is Unix Time.

accessToken.description: This parameter value is provided by the channel

betHistories_payoutDetail.description:
Payout amount for each bet item.
 Sic Bo's 155.156 will be followed by the number of open dice points, for example "155: 1,1,6": 100.
 Betting items on the roulette are followed by points or betTypeInterval codes, such as "200: 17": 3600, "207: 1": 300, "201: 14,17": 1800.

302.description: Withholding amount for bet item "Player 1 Double"

304.description: Withholding amount for bet item "Player 2 Double"

306.description: Withholding amount for bet item "Player 3 Double"
